name: LocalGuideMontclair
0:
”Alexa open local guide montclair”
”breakfast”
”recommend an attraction within five miles”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: local guide montclair
des:
Welcome to the city of Montclair New Jersey! This skill will be your local guide.

For suggestions on restaurants, just say "coffee", "breakfast", "lunch", or "dinner"; or ask "recommend an attraction" or just say "go outside" for the current weather conditions.
